title: Online-Based Continuing Professional Development (CPD) Course for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic medical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: A blended education program utilizing online learning modules in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can independently acquire new medical knowledge (e.g., disease management, treatment protocols) through online platforms.
Learners engage in knowledge sharing and critical thinking with peers using discussion forums, mobile quizzes, and similar tools.
Learners monitor weekly learning outcomes through formative assessments (quizzes, case analyses) and establish improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
